sourcesContent:
Employees Management

EmployeeId Name Email Phone Salary DOJ Actions
{{employee.empId}} {{employee.name}} {{employee.email}} {{employee.phone}} {{employee.salary}} {{employee.dateOfJoining}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { EmployeeService } from '../../services/employee.service'; import { Employee } from '../../interfaces/employee'; import { Location } from '@angular/common'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Page } from '../../interfaces/page'; import { PaginationInstance, PaginationService } from 'ngx-pagination'; @Component({ selector: 'app-employees-list', templateUrl: './employees-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./employees-list.component.scss'] }) export class EmployeesListComponent implements OnInit{ // Initialize employeesListData with default values for its properties employeesListPageData!: Page; currentPage = 1; pageSize = 5; totalItems = 0; paginationConfig: PaginationInstance = { id: 'my-pagination-id', itemsPerPage: 5, currentPage: 1 }; constructor(private employeeService : EmployeeService,private paginationService: PaginationService){ } ngOnInit( ) { this.paginationService.register(this.paginationConfig); this.getEmployeesList(); } getEmployeesList(){ this.employeeService.getEmployeesList(this.currentPage - 1, this.pageSize).subscribe((data) => { this.employeesListPageData = data; console.log('fetched employeesssss', JSON.stringify(this.employeesListPageData)); this.totalItems = data.totalElements; }); } onPageChange(event: any): void { this.currentPage = event; this.getEmployeesList(); } deleteEmployeeById(id : number){ const fetchedId = Number(id); console.log('printing number '+ id); this.employeeService.deleteEmployeeById(fetchedId).subscribe((data) => { console.log('deleting ', data) console.log('employee has been deleted',id); }); window.alert('Employee Has Been Delete Sucessfully employee :'+id); this.employeeService.redirectTo('/'); } }
